availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Todd County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Levina Bryan on March 17, 1823. Married to Achsah H. Knight on May 3, 1845. Father of Urban Kennedy, David Kennedy, Henry Kennedy, Mary Kennedy, Michael Kennedy, Theodore Kennedy, William Kennedy, Lavinia C. Kennedy, and J.D. Kennedy. Farmer in Todd County in 1850. Owned 14 enslaved persons in 1850. Farmer in Todd County in 1860. Owned 16 enslaved persons in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Todd County, District no. 1, p. 241. Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Todd County, District no. 1, p. 15. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Todd County, p. 94. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Todd County, p. 56. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Todd County, p. 370. Kentucky, County Marriage Records, 1783-1965, Todd County, 1820-1886, Film no. 000367186. Kentucky, County Marriage Records, 1783-1965, Todd County, 1820-1886, Film no. 000367186.
